page.title: 09The B.P Oil depot at Dalston
page.content: B.P oil limited is an oil distribution company.The depot in Dalston is down Station Road.At present there are 14 people employed there.The managing director his deputy,4 maintenence men an engineer and 8 drivers.Storage tanks there hold 6,500,000 litres of fuel oil.There are 11 storage tanks.They use two different types of transport,rail and road.The railways bring the products from oil refineries at Grangemouth,Teesport and Stanlow. Across the road there is a rail siding where the products are received.On each train a total of 840,000 litres of oil may be carried.The oil is distributed by lorry tanker.It is taken to places within a 100 mile raidus.Who knows this depot could be a nuclear power station in the future.
